import React from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import CartItem from '../components/CartItem' function Cart() { const { cart } = useSelector((state) => state); const [totalAmount, setTotalAmount] = useState(0); // use Effect used there coz for everytime ui renders or cart changes we have to run this useEffect(() => { setTotalAmount(cart.reduce((acc, curr) => acc + curr.price, 0)) }, [cart]) return (
{ cart.length > 0 ? (
{ cart.map((item, index) => { return }) }
Your Cart
Summary

Total items: {cart.length}

Total Amount: ${totalAmount}

) : (

Cart Empty

) }
) } export default Cart
